Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT MORE THAN 200.00 CAMERA
Reviews.Author: lori brady
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS,.I WISH I WOULD HAVE BOUGHT THIS BEFORE I HAD BOUGHT MY GE OFF OF HSN.  SO EASY TO USE, SMALL COMPACT QUICK IN BETWEEN SHOTS NO HASSLE POINT AND SHOOT. USING THE CARD I WAS USING IN THE GE CAMERA AND HAVEN'T EVEN LOOKED AT THAT CAMERA SINCE I BOUGHT THIS ONE.  GREAT BUY ONE FOR EVERYONE IN YOUR FAMILY AT THIS PRICE YOU WONT' BE SORRY.AND YOU CAN TURN IT ON YOURSELF AND TAKE A PIC TOO.

Reviews.Title: Awful picture quality
Reviews.Author: khonea
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed int he prodict. All pictures are blurry- awful quality even if it is for a child. I do not recommend purchasing this camera.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera for price
Reviews.Author: BunniGurl
Reviews.Content: While the screen was not as large as I had expected and the actual picture quality is not as good as I had hoped this little camera is a good buy for an amature wanting to take pictures of kids and family for fun!

Reviews.Title: Great Kid Camera
Reviews.Author: Sean "27Educators"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a cheap alternative for a kid's camera. It get's the job done far better than some toy camera for the same cost.

Reviews.Title: Vivitar Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: LisaJ
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 10 year old grandson for a vacation. It functioned as descripted, but really should have spent the extra $30-$50 to get a camera that takes better pictures and has a bigger view screen.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Joseph F Dolloff
Reviews.Content: My Daughter loves it! Takes great photos! It's easy for an 11 year old to use, but does go through batteries quite fast.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Margo
Reviews.Content: It makes a good starter camera. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my nephew.  It was his first digital camera.

Reviews.Title: is it or is it not a toy camera. feeling so used
Reviews.Author: lolita finney
Reviews.Content: It like a kid's toy camera. It wasn't what I expected..I will not get anything else from Amazon. So sad

Reviews.Title: vivitar vivicam itwist v7028 digital camera
Reviews.Author: GARRY BRENT WILSON
Reviews.Content: very cheap plastic, my wife had a kodak that i was replacing. if i would have been able to see this before hand i would not have even considered it. looks  and feels like something from the toy department.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Phoebe   Murphy
Reviews.Content: This camera was the worst the pictures are blurry and my movable screen came shatters I do not recommend this for anyone not even kids :(

Reviews.Title: Missed on this one...
Reviews.Author: Texan
Reviews.Content: Not so good. Doesn't take good flash pictures or anything inside. Outside it takes work to get a good picture. Made a huge boo boo on this one.

Reviews.Title: Jordan's camera
Reviews.Author: Jims Chick
Reviews.Content: Definitely worth the price.  Also purchased the carry case.  My granddaughter loved it.  It was her birthday present and she was shocked and very happy when she opened her gift.

Reviews.Title: A one of a kind camera
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. This camera takes as good of picture as it does capturing videos. Plus the anti-shake is great. If you are looking for a good memory card for this I recommend using the New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!. Aside from that, I recommend getting this camera. It really is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money.
Reviews.Author: Ann Benoit
Reviews.Content: The video feature is nothing to write home about. It seems rather dim when you are taking video on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Was SHOCKED how INCREDIBLE this product TRULY is.
Reviews.Author: Edward R. Kusecki "Hockey"
Reviews.Content: I was just looking for a standard digital camera that took pictures&NOT; much more. I was looking for this because at my age I'm modern era brain dead. I received so much more from this product with all it's  incredible features and all it's wonderful abilities. I just couldn't believe I'd get such a wonderful product and at such a low price.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: adrianne
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a christmas gift. great value and very stylish. very user friendly and easy to use. it made a great gift.

Reviews.Title: exciting gift
Reviews.Author: Bea V
Reviews.Content: This is intended for a Christmas gift so we haven't used it but it looks great!  I do worry that the screen used for self-portraits may be vulnerable in the hands of kids the ages recommended but, maybe it will be fine.

Reviews.Title: Vivitar flip camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara P. Excell "just me"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to buy easy to use. I don't like the flip it doesn't do anything and the viewing screen is not good but camera cost is ok

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: As someone with a photography degree, the quality of the photos on this camera is AWFUL.But i bought it for my mom who barely knows her way around a cell phone, so for her, this gets the job done.  Really great, cheap camera for little kids too.

Reviews.Title: got for my niece as a gift
Reviews.Author: tami
Reviews.Content: very light plastic and feels like the screen could break off easy. not sure how pictures come out as i have not seen any yet so i can only say about the look and feel of camera. these days things are not made like they use to be made and almost everything seems to be made with plastic. i just hope that it holds up

Reviews.Title: Muy buenos
Reviews.Author: mayerlin
Reviews.Content: Demasiado bueno el producto entrega inmediata lo garantizo cien por ciento. pronto volvere hacer contacto para nueva compra. Gracias muy amables.

Reviews.Title: It didn't work for me!
Reviews.Author: blessed205
Reviews.Content: When I purchased  the camera, it was with the expectancy that when I opened it I could use it right away without anything needed on my part.  Not so I had to go buy a memory card, which defeated the purpose of ordering it.  Where I had to go for the memory card I just bought the camera there also.The ad never mention memory card was needed.  :(  disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Is this a toy?
Reviews.Author: Erica Hertel
Reviews.Content: Thing feels like it's going to break if I look at it wrong and the pictures it takes are barely visible. My old Straight Talk phone takes better pictures than this thing. Horrible camera. Only bother with it if you want a toy for you 10 year old or something.

ProductInfo.Features:
Flip Screen, Takes Self Potraits
4x Digital Zoom
Anti-Shake
Smile & Face Detection
Auto Flash
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar ViviCam iTwist V7028 Digital Camera - Blueberry
